extendedInfo.description: You have a naughty dog? Forget about expensive dog training classes! Here comes the best free Dog Whistle app for Android that will help you for sure.Whistles for dogs have a much greater advantage in dog training in relation to human voices and represent excellent dog training equipment. Human voice can vary depending on their emotions while a dog whistle sound is always constant. With this dog training whistle you can call him from a distance, teach your puppy to learn new tricks, or make him stop barking and making a mess. It is also good for those who are afraid of dogs and want a whistle that works as a dog repellent.The frequency of this so-called silent dog whistle sound is 22000Hz and it is above the range of human hearing. It doesn't produce the loud irritating noise that an audible whistle would produce, so it can be used to train or command a dog without disturbing nearby people. Become a real dog whisperer!Dog Whistle is a necessary accessory for every dog owner. Whistles are very helpful during the dog obedience training and daily walks. It is here in order to facilitate cooperation with your dog.*Use this new "leash" at a distance and never miss your friend!*Everyone knows the situation: a dog runs out into the street, you want to call him. Traffic noise is, however, stronger than your voice and the dog does not respond. In that situation only a dog whistle can help, because the dog can discern it from all the other sounds.How to communicate with your dog?There are three modes available:* Manual: Touch the screen to play the dog whistle training up sound and move your finger to stop it* Continuous: Touch the screen to play the sound and touch again to stop it* Timer: Switch to this mode to start playing the sound at a certain moment* Widget: Play the sound by tapping on the button on your home screen* Notification bar: when the sound is playing in the backgroundHow to train your dog?Here are some useful puppy training tips you should use. The first step in dog whistle training process is to select series of commands that will be used as signals. For example: two short whistle sounds could mean the command "stop", or one long whistle sound to command "sit". To help you teach the dog, combine verbal commands with the whistle commands. So for the command "sit", give the verbal command accompanied with a dog whistle noise to connect the verbal command with a whistle sound. Applying this and other commands to the dog, you will make the understanding of whistle sounds easier. This is the best dog whistle online. Download free app and have a great time with your pet!Note:âDog Whistleâ is a free app for Android. Development of this app is ad supported. You may get shortcut icon(s) on your phone desktop. These are only Internet shortcuts to other free apps. You can remove icon(s) anytime without affecting this app in any way. You may get notification(s) in your system tray with links to new free apps. If you don't want to receive these, feel free to opt out at http://unpush.meCompatibility:This app has been tested on the following Tablets and smartphones HTC One X (Android 4.0 Ice cream sandwich), Sony Ericsson Xperia Arc S (Android 2.3.4 Gingerbread), Samsung Galaxy S2 (Android 2.3.7), Tablet Samsung Galaxy Tab 10.1 (Android 3.1 Honeycomb), Samsung Galaxy Mini (Android 2.2.1 Froyo), Samsung Galaxy S3 (Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich), Galaxy S4, HTC 1 (Android OS, v4.1.2 Jelly Bean), Nexus 4 (Android 4.2 Jelly Bean), Huawei Ascend 2 (Android OS, v2.3 Gingerbread) and Samsung Galaxy Note 2.Compatible with: att, Boost Mobile, Straight talk, and Verizon powered mobile phones.
